description:
Seeking a professional business to business Sales Training Manager to grow our team in the Kansas Market. The city of Overland Park and its suburbs make up a booming market and Colonial has had a 20% growth for the last 3 years and need great people to help continue that trend! Will work closely with the District Manager to drive sales and assist in training new talent.

This person must have:
• Clear Communication Skills
• Results Orientated
• Team player
• Focused

If you enjoy helping people while making money, please submit your resume!

Culture is everything to us. We are looking for team minded individuals who want to heavily impact our growth while promoting our culture we have worked so hard to create.

Successful Training Managers have 3 qualities.

1.Teachable. Willing to be trained and learn our sales system

2. Positive Attitude. Builds our culture. Key player that adds to our organization

3. Work Ethic. We are here to make money. Build a Legacy to Leave a Legacy

This is an independent contractor opportunity in which you are in business for yourself, but not by yourself. Any income range associated with this posting represents the potential earnings available to you as a business owner in this role; not a guaranteed salary. All earnings in this role are sales results based and uncapped, with a tremendous potential for growth. Apply now to learn more about how you can take control of your career, in partnership with Colonial Life.

Job Types: Full-time, Part-time

Pay: Up to $120,000.00 per year

Schedule:
• Monday to Friday

Work Location: In person
